page.title: 07Recreation in Bacup
page.content: There are quite a lot of activities for people living in the Rossendale Valley area but they often have to travel outside our study grid to towns like Rawtenstall, Waterfoot, Stubbins, Haslingden or Ramsbottom. In Bacup there is a new Leisure Hall. If we want to do something in our spare time these are the activities they provide:_ squash,badminton,table tennis and dancing. Groups and clubs in the area hire the hall for plays, meetings,exhibitions,dog shows and antique fairs. There is a riding school near Weir where Simona goes. She goes for a two hour lesson and it costs her Â£3. Other children go running. They train on Tuesday and Thursday nights and it costs just 25pence.
